matrix_exp_n.name: Matrix data pack I
matrix_exp_n.description: Supplemental pack for enhancing Matrix chips.

matrix_exp_r.name: Matrix Data Pack II
matrix_exp_r.description: Supplemental pack for enhancing Matrix chips.

matrix_exp_sr.name: Matrix Data Pack III
matrix_exp_sr.description: Supplemental pack for enhancing Matrix chips.

matrix_exp_ssr.name: Matrix Data Pack IV
matrix_exp_ssr.description: Supplemental pack for enhancing Matrix chips.

matrix_N1_1.name: Wandering Aberrant
matrix_N1_1.description: It's been wandering since it escaped from the lab. Is the aberration due to experiments or Omnium radiation? No one knows.

matrix_N1_2.name: Feral Nature
matrix_N1_2.description: The nature suppressed by domestication slowly returns as it acclimates to the wild.

matrix_N1_3.name: Brute Force
matrix_N1_3.description: Seems like it knew it could break the cage by force and escape the bondage.

matrix_N1_4.name: Homeseeker
matrix_N1_4.description: Despite footprints all over Aesperia, still couldn't find its home... For it was born in a lab.

matrix_N2_1.name: Overheat
matrix_N2_1.description: The heat makes one squirm and want to vent by breaking things.

matrix_N2_2.name: Hack & Slash
matrix_N2_2.description: Never had any formal training. Fighting means hacking away randomly with a weapon.

matrix_N2_3.name: Might Makes Right
matrix_N2_3.description: All's fair in love and war. Do what you can to win.

matrix_N2_4.name: Handy Tool
matrix_N2_4.description: Weapons are just instruments of destruction. Don't count on pilots to invest emotions into armor.

matrix_R1_1.name: Explosive Core
matrix_R1_1.description: The Omnium core burns bright within.

matrix_R1_2.name: Binding Thread
matrix_R1_2.description: Not the actual thread, of course. The creator just wanted to inspire fear.

matrix_R1_3.name: Web of Dread
matrix_R1_3.description: A spider's look often scares people more than the damage it can deal.

matrix_R1_4.name: Overwhelm
matrix_R1_4.description: They would be a nightmare to deal with in groups.

matrix_R2_1.name: Hauler
matrix_R2_1.description: Back and forth, it shuttles between the mines and the track.

matrix_R2_2.name: Restart
matrix_R2_2.description: Vehicles can attack if they receive a new command.

matrix_R2_3.name: Mind of Machine
matrix_R2_3.description: A cyber modification without any free will, thus carrying out orders like a machine.

matrix_R2_4.name: Bullseye
matrix_R2_4.description: The biggest edge in a modification is the precision attack unhindered by emotions or sensibility.

matrix_R3_1.name: Standard Guard
matrix_R3_1.description: Being a good armed guard means protecting the thing you're guarding.

matrix_R3_2.name: Terminator Guard
matrix_R3_2.description: Merciless to anyone attempting to destroy what it's guarding.

matrix_R3_3.name: Unyielding Guard
matrix_R3_3.description: No matter how powerful the enemy, it will not fall until it's utterly destroyed.

matrix_R3_4.name: Tenet Guard
matrix_R3_4.description: Industrial creations have no free will, but the rules they follow could probably be called their tenets.

matrix_R4_1.name: Provocateurs
matrix_R4_1.description: Ravagers that raise hell everywhere just because they have the might to do so.

matrix_R4_2.name: Anarchists
matrix_R4_2.description: They follow no orders. Chaos is what they want.

matrix_R4_3.name: Melee Killer
matrix_R4_3.description: No one wants to fight them again.

matrix_R4_4.name: Chaosbringer
matrix_R4_4.description: Some things are chaotic in nature and wouldn't mind getting more chaotic.

matrix_R6_1.name: Attack Analyzer
matrix_R6_1.description: Any fighting style has a weakness if you observe long enough.

matrix_R6_2.name: Feared Thug
matrix_R6_2.description: The timid feared this name, and the thug cared not.

matrix_R6_3.name: Electricks
matrix_R6_3.description: Electroshock is one of their powers. Or rather, the one they used most.

matrix_R6_4.name: Fighting Spirit
matrix_R6_4.description: As a fighter, fighting is in their blood.

matrix_R7_2.name: Ready to Go
matrix_R7_2.description: Has anyone ever beaten this person before? No, as far as we know. However, it is certain that no one will ever run into someone who can.

matrix_R7_3.name: Unshakable
matrix_R7_3.description: Hide your weak points and be invincible.

matrix_R7_4.name: Bland
matrix_R7_4.description: Being too powerful is a problem too... One that the less competent can never understand.

matrix_SR1_1.name: Robarg: Greed
matrix_SR1_1.description: Rooted in avarice and without an end in sight.

matrix_SR1_2.name: Robarg: Instinct
matrix_SR1_2.description: Its instinct is always surging ahead.

matrix_SR1_3.name: Robarg: Exhaustion
matrix_SR1_3.description: Devours everything, from body and energy to your will to survive.

matrix_SR1_4.name: Robarg: The End
matrix_SR1_4.description: It has been looking forward to the end.

matrix_SR2_1.name: Apophis: Giant Body
matrix_SR2_1.description: Huge in size, with every move causing great changes.

matrix_SR2_2.name: Apophis: Confrontation
matrix_SR2_2.description: What am I fighting against? Fate or myself?

matrix_SR2_3.name: Apophis: Weak Point
matrix_SR2_3.description: The weakness is the security configurations embedded in the chip, which cannot be overcome or resisted.

matrix_SR2_4.name: Apophis: Hatred
matrix_SR2_4.description: Why was it made, and why was it modified?

matrix_SR3_1.name: Frost Bot: Do Not Underestimate
matrix_SR3_1.description: It looks like food, indeed, but that doesn't mean you shouldn't be cautious.

matrix_SR3_2.name: Frost Bot: Swift End
matrix_SR3_2.description: The combat system of armor has only one goal: End the fight as swiftly as possible.

matrix_SR3_3.name: Frost Bot: Quick Freeze
matrix_SR3_3.description: Freeze the surrounding in blocks of ice.

matrix_SR4_1.name: Sobek: Scheme
matrix_SR4_1.description: Be careful not to get dragged into the mire it's in.

matrix_SR4_2.name: Sobek: Opportunity
matrix_SR4_2.description: It's always patient, enough for some unlucky sap to step on it eventually.

matrix_SR4_3.name: Sobek: Confusion
matrix_SR4_3.description: It's not moving. Is it asleep or just conserving energy?

matrix_SR4_4.name: Sobek: Restlessness
matrix_SR4_4.description: It gets bored too, and when it feels restless, it's some innocent passersby who might suffer.

matrix_SR5_1.name: Barbarossa: Power Play
matrix_SR5_1.description: The two heads usually fight over who gets to kill the prey. A little instigation and the fight turns physical.

matrix_SR5_2.name: Barbarossa: Divided Land
matrix_SR5_2.description: Where was it from? Maybe it still somewhat knows.

matrix_SR5_3.name: Barbarossa: Natural Aggression
matrix_SR5_3.description: It never gets tired of the eternal biting and grinding, always eagerly awaits the next victim.

matrix_SR5_4.name: Barbarossa: Intimidating Roar
matrix_SR5_4.description: It starts with a roar—that is also the death knell for the innocent victims.

matrix_SR6_1.name: Pepper: Assembly Line
matrix_SR6_1.description: Who can explain to her that she has been toiling away for a long time now?

matrix_SR6_2.name: Pepper: Surgical Scar
matrix_SR6_2.description: Aberrations cannot be reversed. Just like post-surgery scars, you don't get a chance.

matrix_SR6_3.name: Pepper: Armband
matrix_SR6_3.description: As a doctor, you cannot turn away, cannot be complacent, cannot be helpless.

matrix_SR6_4.name: Pepper: Sleeping Pill
matrix_SR6_4.description: She has insomnia from not wanting to face the dead in her dreams.

matrix_SR7_2.name: Hilda: Dockbred
matrix_SR7_2.description: The nostrils have been smelling the salty scent of the sea for far too long, they're uncomfortable when it's missing.

matrix_SR7_3.name: Hilda: Haggler
matrix_SR7_3.description: Never buy things at full price, always haggle till your last breath!

matrix_SR7_4.name: Hilda: Smash Ball
matrix_SR7_4.description: There are not many recreations you can do with physically handicapped friends.

matrix_SR8_1.name: Ene: Competitive
matrix_SR8_1.description: The accelerated output when power is increased will also be delivered in faint tremors to the weapon.

matrix_SR8_2.name: Ene: Loose Cannon
matrix_SR8_2.description: The Hykros Suppressor Lab never forgets the fight she put up.

matrix_SR8_3.name: Ene: Second Life
matrix_SR8_3.description: A body without pain will function to the last ounce of energy until complete destruction.

matrix_SR8_4.name: Ene: Family Photo
matrix_SR8_4.description: It was taken only because her father begged her to.

matrix_SR9_1.name: Bai Ling: Diverse
matrix_SR9_1.description: What to do when you think about it and it spreads?

matrix_SR9_2.name: Bai Ling: Dissipation
matrix_SR9_2.description: From disorderly to orderly? Outside interference is probably needed. Probably, I said.

matrix_SR9_3.name: Bai Ling: Fair Trade
matrix_SR9_3.description: Goods should be traded according to their own value. But how do you put a value on something that's immeasurable?

matrix_SR9_4.name: Bai Ling: Nth Power
matrix_SR9_4.description: If only experience gained and ROI worked exponentially...

matrix_SR12_1.name: Echo: Until the End
matrix_SR12_1.description: A straight line of thought to completing the current goal.

matrix_SR12_2.name: Echo: Post Crisis
matrix_SR12_2.description: Memory of the snowfield on a truck after surviving a crisis.

matrix_SR12_3.name: Echo: Black or White
matrix_SR12_3.description: It's too hard for her to comprehend anything complicated.

matrix_SR12_4.name: Echo: Homesick
matrix_SR12_4.description: Two homes, two shelters, both cozy. Either way, it's the homecoming.

matrix_SSR1_1.name: Meryl: Swordfight Simulation
matrix_SSR1_1.description: Complex swordfight simulation seemingly used for calibration. Anyway, not something for the average person.

matrix_SSR1_2.name: Meryl: Wake-Up Call
matrix_SSR1_2.description: Chained memory shards used to implant consciousness. Note that it doesn't come with an instruction manual.

matrix_SSR1_3.name: Meryl: Absolute Authority
matrix_SSR1_3.description: It, of course, represents the self-approval and outside recognition of an Executor's power.

matrix_SSR1_4.name: Meryl: Detached
matrix_SSR1_4.description: Mental communication barriers set up by rejecting all socialization.

matrix_SSR2_1.name: Tsubasa: Weather Vane
matrix_SSR2_1.description: "The wind blows." That sums up every cause for leaving and setting off again.

matrix_SSR2_2.name: Tsubasa: Gravitator
matrix_SSR2_2.description: She's always moving about and only stays in the spot she had thoroughly scouted.

matrix_SSR2_3.name: Tsubasa: Drifter
matrix_SSR2_3.description: How can you tell which faith is the right one? Answer: The one that ultimately emerges victorious.

matrix_SSR3_1.name: Cocoritter: Artistic Instinct
matrix_SSR3_1.description: The thoughts behind the creation of craft can also be applied on the battlefield.

matrix_SSR3_2.name: Cocoritter: Identity Overlap
matrix_SSR3_2.description: Her silhouette is overlapping with the protector she remembered.

matrix_SSR3_3.name: Cocoritter: Caregiver
matrix_SSR3_3.description: Her expectation is simple—just easing your pain.

matrix_SSR3_4.name: Cocoritter: Helper
matrix_SSR3_4.description: Trust me, leave the support to me.

matrix_SSR4_1.name: KING: Underground Ruler
matrix_SSR4_1.description: A good reputation still won't change the inability to get by with an empty wallet, so let's fill it up first and ask questions later.

matrix_SSR4_2.name: KING: Live to Fight
matrix_SSR4_2.description: These miners work mindlessly like zombies. You'll become one of them if you don't get away.

matrix_SSR4_3.name: KING: Thrillseeker
matrix_SSR4_3.description: Craves excitement and seemingly over-the-top joy... which does not include career aspirations.

matrix_SSR4_4.name: KING: One Man Army
matrix_SSR4_4.description: Still, there's a limit to fighting with just fists, which he learned at a very young age.

matrix_SSR5_1.name: Cobalt-B: Sixth Sense
matrix_SSR5_1.description: It's as keen as forced static observation upon various planes, with some strong luck to boot.

matrix_SSR5_2.name: Cobalt-B: Starting Capital
matrix_SSR5_2.description: Two pieces of collateral, uncollected even after the debt had been repaid, were seemingly left as a sort of generous memento... or perhaps they were simply forgotten.

matrix_SSR5_3.name: Cobalt-B: Master Artist
matrix_SSR5_3.description: What's wrong with calling this "artwork"? You don't think a wrench is as elegant as a paintbrush?

matrix_SSR5_4.name: Cobalt-B: Rise and Shine
matrix_SSR5_4.description: Put an alarm clock on the mini-drone to wake you up in the morning.

matrix_SSR6_1.name: Claudia: Rational Analysis
matrix_SSR6_1.description: First, learn to accept popular opinions, then make judgments about the issue at hand.

matrix_SSR6_2.name: Claudia: True Self
matrix_SSR6_2.description: Be true to yourself so you're no longer bound by the past and will hold the future.

matrix_SSR6_3.name: Claudia: Righteous
matrix_SSR6_3.description: All efforts made to uphold justice will be proven worthwhile.

matrix_SSR6_4.name: Claudia: Aura of Determination
matrix_SSR6_4.description: Bring values into action, even spread them around without being aware.

matrix_SSR7_1.name: Shiro: Isolated
matrix_SSR7_1.description: Skittish about everyone like a wild cat, yet sometimes sit by a pool and play with the water, wondering why so lonely.

matrix_SSR7_2.name: Shiro: Longing for Sea
matrix_SSR7_2.description: A big part of the ocean's beauty stems from the fact that it could never be fully understood.

matrix_SSR7_3.name: Shiro: Great Singer
matrix_SSR7_3.description: Proof of her awesome singing voice, from a researcher who defied death to smuggle the recording out.

matrix_SSR7_4.name: Shiro: Cat-like
matrix_SSR7_4.description: Every touch is cautious, every gaze deftly avoided... That's her humble way to pursue happiness.

matrix_SSR8_1.name: Zero: Paranormal Calculation
matrix_SSR8_1.description: Break through logic, subvert reality, completely abandon formulas based on experience to arrive at the final result.

matrix_SSR8_2.name: Zero: Terminal Protocol
matrix_SSR8_2.description: Memories are just matters of imprints. As for whether they're real or false, you must decide for yourself.

matrix_SSR8_3.name: Zero: Info Sort
matrix_SSR8_3.description: Intel is generated through sorting loose info and data.

matrix_SSR8_4.name: Zero: Survival of Fittest
matrix_SSR8_4.description: Survival of the fittest is the law of nature and the manifestation of individual superiority.

matrix_SSR9_1.name: Samir: Just Kidding
matrix_SSR9_1.description: If you said her jokes are corny, she would reply, "Why so serious?"

matrix_SSR9_2.name: Samir: Dearly Departed
matrix_SSR9_2.description: One who lives in the past is unreachable and can't let go.

matrix_SSR9_3.name: Samir: Silver Bullet
matrix_SSR9_3.description: She owns a silver bullet. Is she hunting vampires?

matrix_SSR9_4.name: Samir: Future Focus
matrix_SSR9_4.description: She's always certain of her destiny.

matrix_SSR10_1.name: Huma: Disoriented
matrix_SSR10_1.description: It was the instinct to see the light that led the baby birds out of their shells.

matrix_SSR10_2.name: Huma: Blank Slate
matrix_SSR10_2.description: Start writing the program for a completely new personality right now.

matrix_SSR10_3.name: Huma: Easy Does It
matrix_SSR10_3.description: An amnesiac, just like you. Always tries to do whatever can be done first.

matrix_SSR10_4.name: Huma: Innocent
matrix_SSR10_4.description: The stiff expression is a part of the package.

matrix_SSR11_1.name: Crow: Eleventh Dimension
matrix_SSR11_1.description: Some things are intangible but do truly exist.

matrix_SSR11_2.name: Crow: Formitized
matrix_SSR11_2.description: The past is in the past. The present is what you need to seize.

matrix_SSR11_3.name: Crow: Dire Survivor
matrix_SSR11_3.description: Never give up, even though it's more than a long shot.

matrix_SSR11_4.name: Crow: Rendition
matrix_SSR11_4.description: A bizarre clown show, sometimes very hard to fathom.

matrix_SSR12_1.name: Marc: Burden
matrix_SSR12_1.description: I'm the mightiest warrior and the people here need me.

matrix_SSR12_2.name: Marc: Sister's Hope
matrix_SSR12_2.description: I drink a bottle of milk everyday now... Can you see it?

matrix_SSR12_3.name: Marc: Fair World
matrix_SSR12_3.description: Every one of us is a unique creation.

matrix_SSR12_4.name: Marc: Dreamworld
matrix_SSR12_4.description: Dreaming of walking into the Hall with you one day.

matrix_SSR13_1.name: Bai Yuekui: Seeking Truth
matrix_SSR13_1.description: Have the courage to make mistakes in course of seeking scientific truth.

matrix_SSR13_2.name: Bai Yuekui: Memory & Life
matrix_SSR13_2.description: One can keep making new memories as long as one keeps on living.

matrix_SSR13_3.name: Bai Yuekui: Window of Opportunity
matrix_SSR13_3.description: Always be prepared for the opportunity to escape the doom.

matrix_SSR13_4.name: Bai Yuekui: Spiritual Advent
matrix_SSR13_4.description: Emotion is the source of power to advent our spirit.

matrix_SSR14_1.name: Nemesis: Alloy Cells
matrix_SSR14_1.description: More than half of the hull has been replaced. I wonder if there is a way to measure the proportion of souls?

matrix_SSR14_2.name: Nemesis: Teddy Bear
matrix_SSR14_2.description: I have lost two places to call home, but fortunately some belongings stayed with me throughout the time.

matrix_SSR14_3.name: Nemesis: Refreshed
matrix_SSR14_3.description: The innocence wears away, and the courage looks more mature and polished.

matrix_SSR14_4.name: Nemesis: Inner Drive
matrix_SSR14_4.description: The memory and heart of humanity can be a stumbling block or a driving force.

matrix_SSR15_1.name: Frigg: Soulblade
matrix_SSR15_1.description: I will cut off your greed for the forbidden things.

matrix_SSR15_2.name: Frigg: Post-Cataclysm
matrix_SSR15_2.description: My family... friends... I'm the only one left now...

matrix_SSR15_3.name: Frigg: Stance
matrix_SSR15_3.description: You have your definition, so what is justice to me?

matrix_SSR15_4.name: Frigg: Doubt
matrix_SSR15_4.description: Who's behind all this? Can anybody tell me?

matrix_SSR16_1.name: Ruby: From Behind
matrix_SSR16_1.description: The delicate buds are always carefully protected, but they also want to walk to the frontline and be side by side with her, even if they would be on tiptoe.

matrix_SSR16_2.name: Ruby: Vapor
matrix_SSR16_2.description: As hazy as transpiring vapor, are the so-called past events just illusions in dreams?

matrix_SSR16_3.name: Ruby: Shadowing
matrix_SSR16_3.description: You have to trot to keep up with her, but if you do fall behind, she'll be waiting for you not far away.

matrix_SSR17_4.name: Saki Fuwa: In Control
matrix_SSR17_4.description: An action that feels like everything is under control.

matrix_SSR18_1.name: Lin: Bow Down
matrix_SSR18_1.description: Responsibility that comes with identity, a burden and a trial.

matrix_SSR18_2.name: Lin: Light Pollution
matrix_SSR18_2.description: Light that flows through every corner of the city, and above it...

matrix_SSR18_3.name: Lin: Standing in a Mirror
matrix_SSR18_3.description: An impeccable and dazzling figure, regardless of the angle.

matrix_SSR18_4.name: Lin: Black Fox Mask
matrix_SSR18_4.description: Sometimes, she transforms into a shadow that moves freely between the building.

matrix_SSR19_2.name: Lyra: Revived Symphony
matrix_SSR19_2.description: Even the most perfect and precise performance does not come close to the symphony on that day...

matrix_SSR19_3.name: Lyra: Hold a Candle
matrix_SSR19_3.description: Protecting this flickering candlelight is not just a term of the will.

matrix_SSR19_4.name: Lyra: Endless Study
matrix_SSR19_4.description: It may take a lifetime to uncover the true meaning of that book.

matrix_SSR20_1.name: Tian Lang: Astral General
matrix_SSR20_1.description: If he was born in ancient times, he might have been a great general defending his land.

matrix_SSR20_2.name: Tian Lang: Avoiding Conflict
matrix_SSR20_2.description: Rather than fighting, he prefers to spend time with flowers and plants in peace.

matrix_SSR20_3.name: Tian Lang: Turmoil
matrix_SSR20_3.description: The trees long for peace, but the wind will never cease. There is nothing that can be done.

matrix_SSR21_2.name: Annabella: Blank Command
matrix_SSR21_2.description: It easily becomes unresponsive without a command.

matrix_SSR21_3.name: Annabella: Altruism
matrix_SSR21_3.description: —One of the last words you would use to describe a vampire.

matrix_SSR21_4.name: Annabella: Dead Leaves
matrix_SSR21_4.description: There will always be people who are only willing to act within their comfort zone.

matrix_SSR22_2.name: Alyss: Shared Vision
matrix_SSR22_2.description: Become someone who can protect everybody...

matrix_SSR22_3.name: Alyss: Legacy
matrix_SSR22_3.description: The mission is passed on from generation to generation.

matrix_SSR22_4.name: Alyss: Lasting Motive
matrix_SSR22_4.description: Even if we are battered and broken, we won't back down.

matrix_SSR23_1.name: Umi: Bewitch
matrix_SSR23_1.description: Slowly and patiently guide the audience and self into the magic illusion.

matrix_SSR23_2.name: Umi: Mystify
matrix_SSR23_2.description: The most fundamental laws are "deception," "misdirection," and "manipulation." This is what I tell myself before each performance.

matrix_SSR23_3.name: Umi: Beguile
matrix_SSR23_3.description: Sometimes "she" can't decide whether to be blissfully unaware or feign ignorance.

matrix_SSR23_4.name: Umi: Deceive
matrix_SSR23_4.description: She has to deceive everyone, including herself.

matrix_SSR24_1.name: Fenrir: Dream
matrix_SSR24_1.description: I dream of chocolate. Can I believe that this is real?

matrix_SSR24_2.name: Fenrir: Abandoned Dog
matrix_SSR24_2.description: A shackled past, a wandering present.

matrix_SSR24_3.name: Fenrir: Home
matrix_SSR24_3.description: Will I ever have a home?

matrix_SSR24_4.name: Fenrir: Dependence
matrix_SSR24_4.description: If there are no more goodbyes, I am alright with being used.
